PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Included are all passive tree steps, gem setups and all rare and unique gear choices.
How to use: - Choose a passive tree in the bottom-left dropdown menu, and adjust your level at the top - Adjust the example gear or import your own stuff with the Import/Export Build feature - Adjust gem levels and quality if needed - Configure anything relevant in the Configuration tab, such as "Do you have Tailwind?" if it's used
Small notes: - All rare gear uses the most recommended affixes for that slot with average rolls - Gems that don't need quality or need to stay at a certain level are shown like that, all others are defaulted at 20/20 - Some Gems or Items are currently missing in Path of Building and will be added later - The negative Mana Regeneration comes from the Agnostic Keystone, Path of Building assumes it's constantly up when allocating it
